meanings.definition: A wire or strip of metal, plastic, or other material sewn into the underside of a brassiere or other garment to provide support for the breasts.
meanings.sent1: The underwire in my bra helps keep everything in place.
meanings.sent2: She prefers bras with underwire for better support.
meanings.sent3: The underwire in her bra decided to take a break when she needed it most.
meanings.sent4: The underwire of the bra was like a sturdy bridge supporting her chest.
meanings.sent5: The underwire felt like a gentle hug, keeping her comfortable all day.

meanings.definition: To provide support for the breasts with an underwire.
meanings.sent1: She chose to underwire her new bra for added comfort.
meanings.sent2: Many women underwire their bras for extra support.
meanings.sent3: He tried to underwire his shirt to mimic the effect of a bra.
meanings.sent4: Underwiring her garment with care, she ensured a snug fit.
meanings.sent5: The tailor expertly underwired the garment, enhancing its shape.
